mapper.select: SELECT f.id id, f.cus_no cusNo, f.user_no userNo, f.acc_no accNo, f.acc_user_name accUserName, f.bank_card_no bankCardNo, f.create_time createTime, f.modify_time modifyTime, f.mchn_parent mchnParent, f.mchn_child mchnChild, f.has_open_acc_fuiou hasOpenAccFuiou, c.name name, c.mobile mobile, c.cert_type certType, c.cert_no certNo, c.user_id userId, c.is_auth_real_name isAuthRealName, c.create_user_id createUserId, c.modify_user_id modifyUserId, c.cust_id custId FROM t_gq_fss_fuiou_account f,t_gq_fss_customer c WHERE f.cus_no=c.cust_no and c.cert_no=#{certNo}
